message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's a great deal! Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $70.
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $70 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $85. Let's try to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $85 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $77.50
